physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two soldiers standing on rocks. They are wearing military shorts but without any upperwear. To the left hand side of the photograph, two other people can be seen. One of them seems to be sitting down while the other stands. They are looking at something on the ground. The background of the photograph displays dense greenery and trees.
title_text: Squadron Quartermaster Sergeant (SQMS) Hackshaw and Cpl Walker Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
